detailed_description: An experimental Python package that reimplements AutoGBT, providing automated machine learning capabilities using LightGBM for modeling and Optuna for hyperparameter tuning.

name: Bocoel
one_line_profile: Bayesian Optimization for LLM evaluation
detailed_description: A library that uses Bayesian Optimization as a coverage tool for evaluating Large Language Models (LLMs), enabling efficient and accurate benchmarking.

name: AutoLGBM
one_line_profile: Automated LightGBM training and tuning
detailed_description: A tool to automatically train LightGBM models directly from CSV files, tune hyperparameters using Optuna, and serve the best model via FastAPI.

name: Sherpa
one_line_profile: Hyperparameter optimization library
detailed_description: A Python library for hyperparameter tuning of machine learning models, providing various optimization algorithms and visualization tools.

name: SigOpt Server
one_line_profile: Open source API server for SigOpt optimization platform
detailed_description: The open-source version of the SigOpt API server, providing a platform for hyperparameter optimization, experiment tracking, and visualization.

name: Interactive GP Visualization
one_line_profile: Interactive visualization tool for Gaussian Processes
detailed_description: A web-based interactive tool for visualizing Gaussian Processes, helping researchers understand GP behavior, kernels, and hyperparameters.

name: Six Axis Complementary Filter
one_line_profile: 6-DOF complementary filter for IMU data
detailed_description: A platform-independent C++ implementation of a complementary filter for processing 6-axis IMU data (accelerometer and gyroscope) to estimate orientation.

name: highdimensional-decision-boundary-plot
one_line_profile: Visualization tool for ML classifier decision boundaries in high dimensions
detailed_description: A library for estimating and plotting the decision boundaries of machine learning classifiers in higher-dimensional spaces. It aids in the evaluation and interpretation of model behavior, which is critical in scientific machine learning workflows.

name: advisor
one_line_profile: Open-source hyperparameter tuning system based on Google Vizier
detailed_description: An open-source implementation of the Google Vizier standard for hyperparameter tuning. It serves as a black-box optimization service, supporting various algorithms for optimizing scientific experiments and machine learning models.

name: bayesmark
one_line_profile: Benchmark framework for Bayesian optimization methods
detailed_description: A framework designed to facilitate the benchmarking and comparison of Bayesian optimization methods on real-world machine learning tasks. It provides a standardized environment for evaluating optimization strategies used in closed-loop research.

name: deepbedmap
one_line_profile: Super-resolution deep learning model for Antarctic bed elevation mapping
detailed_description: A tool that uses deep neural networks to generate high-resolution bed elevation datasets for Antarctica (super-resolution). It serves as both a modeling tool and a data repository for glaciology and earth science research.

name: medical-segmentation-pytorch
one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of medical image segmentation models
detailed_description: A comprehensive collection of deep learning models (UNet, UNet++, etc.) specifically implemented for medical semantic segmentation tasks. It includes workflows for training, evaluation, and optimization (Optuna integration).
